about.description:
MolMod is a collection of molecular modelling tools for python. It is
used by other software developed at the CMM, including Yaff, TAMkin
and Zeobuilder.
about.summary: MolMod is a collection of molecular modelling tools for python.

name: molmod
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "molmod" %}
{% set version = "1.4.4" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: ca0e461fe42fc8b7e0b481cda33aac247d86b5fb817b5076e20abc90dd577797

build:
  number: 2
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"
  skip: True  # [py==36]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
  host:
    - python
    - pip 
    - numpy >=1.0
    - cython >=0.24.1
    - future
    - setuptools
  run:
    - cython >=0.24.1
    - future
    - setuptools
    - {{ pin_compatible("numpy") }}

test:
  imports:
    - molmod

about:
  home: http://molmod.github.io/molmod
  license: GPL-3.0
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: 'MolMod is a collection of molecular modelling tools for python.'

  description: |
    MolMod is a collection of molecular modelling tools for python. It is 
    used by other software developed at the CMM, including Yaff, TAMkin 
    and Zeobuilder.
  doc_url: http://molmod.github.io/molmod/
  dev_url: https://github.com/molmod/molmod

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jan-janssen
